title: East and West Europe post war econ. - chart

content.description:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by four suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The next questions refer to the two tables below.

Table 1: INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION IN EASTERN EUROPE

(The values are indexed according to each country’s economic output in 1948. 1948 = 100)

Table 2: GDP PER CAPITA, UNITED STATES DOLLARS, CIRCA 1965
content.question: Which of the following contributed the most to the overall pattern shown in Table 2 ?

choices.label: Faster population growth in Eastern Europe than in Western Europe
The formation of the European Union
The arrival of large numbers of immigrant laborers in Western Europe

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
